nodes.text: The Behebothans were the inhabitants of the planet Beheboth.
The first Behebothans were Bothan colonists. They were gradually replaced by Human settlers and members of other species.

Many Humans from Beheboth displayed cosmetic divergences from the norm, such as purple skin, extra eyebrows, or missing fingers. Otherwise, these Behebothan natives were similar to baseline Humans. Anthropologists theorized that the planet's salt and alkaline duststorms, combined with a relatively small gene pool, caused these minor mutations.
